title: Скажи только слово
overview: Despite the betrayal of the man she loved, Rita has managed to get on with her life. She is self-confident now, loves her, and takes care of her mother and 12-year-old son. Being out of marriage is her conscious choice since she no longer believes in love. However, everything changes one day when Anton, a star in a television series, comes into her life, destroying Rita's ideas of actors as frivolous womanizers. As well as Victor, her son's father, also reappears at the same time, seemingly ready to admit his mistakes and return Rita's love.
